## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                                                            | Type      | Default |
| ------------ | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------- |
| `alwaysOpen` | `always-open` | Disable/Enable accordion collapse of an already open accordion when a new accordion open is triggered. | `boolean` | `false` |
